attributes.action: Stop grown women like Girls Aloud from dressing up as school girls, thus putting real school girls lives/wellbeing at risk.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Grown women in the public eye, such as Girls Aloud, should not be allowed to put school girls and young women at risk by dressing up as school girls. The men who look at these pictures are very often sick and depraved men, who may cause real girls harm or even death.  

Men like Ian Huntley, and the more recent group of three internet chat room men, relied on this kind of filth to feed their thoughts; and had the police not intercepted their internet communications, the two young sisters they were plotting to rape and murder would almost certainly be dead now.
